casebody.data:
JOSIAH WALKER v. JOHN C. SPENCER, Impleaded, &c.

Before Speir and Freedman, JJ.

Decided February 7, 1881. Cross-appeals from interlocutory judgment directing accounting. Daniel T. Robertson, attorney, and James M. Smith, of counsel, for plaintiff. *524Hatch & Tan Allen, for defendant. Freedman, J., wrote for affirmance ; Speir J., concurred.

Judgment affirmed upon the opinion rendered below, without costs.
